summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the new Garage feature rework. All requested features are working correctly: navbar restructure, Garage dropdown with vehicle selection, filter persistence across pages and page refresh, filter indicator badge, and clear filter functionality.
passed_tests: Navbar structure: Dashboard, Inventory, Setups, Repairs in main nav
Garage dropdown moved to right side (next to Feedback)
Garage dropdown shows: View Garage, vehicle list (Subaru Impreza WRX STI), All Vehicles option
Vehicle selection from Garage dropdown works
Filter indicator badge appears when vehicle is selected
Filter badge shows 'Filtering: [Vehicle Name]' with X button to clear
Garage button text changes to selected vehicle name when filtered
Garage button styled with blue background when vehicle is selected
Vehicle selection persists across page navigation (Dashboard → Inventory → Setups → Repairs)
Vehicle selection persists after page refresh (localStorage)
Clear filter button (X) works correctly
All Vehicles option clears the filter
View Garage link navigates to /garage page
Dashboard stats filter by selected vehicle
Recent Activity filters by selected vehicle
Inventory page filters items by selected vehicle OR items with no vehicle
Setups page shows setups filtered by selected vehicle
Repairs page filters by selected vehicle
New Setup button works on Setups page with vehicle selector pre-populated
Setups page has vehicle filter dropdown synced with global filter
seed_data_creation: None - used existing demo user data
context_for_next_testing_agent: The Garage feature rework is complete and working. The global vehicle filter context (VehicleFilterContext) persists selection in localStorage. When a vehicle is selected from the Garage dropdown, all pages filter their data accordingly. The user has one vehicle: Subaru Impreza WRX STI. All navigation items are correctly placed: Dashboard, Inventory, Setups, Repairs in main nav; Garage dropdown and Feedback on right side.

garage_dropdown.vehicle_list: PASS - Shows Subaru Impreza WRX STI
garage_dropdown.checkmark_indicator: PASS - Shows checkmark on selected option

vehicle_filter.filter_badge: PASS - Shows 'Filtering: [Vehicle Name]' with X button
vehicle_filter.garage_button_text: PASS - Changes to vehicle name when filtered
vehicle_filter.persistence_navigation: PASS - Persists across Dashboard, Inventory, Setups, Repairs
vehicle_filter.persistence_refresh: PASS - Persists after page refresh via localStorage
